__e: Your jokes aside, are you going some place?
When I ask a simple question, I don't expect I should have to listen to your lousy jokes.
In fact, for a second, I thought the whole thing might've been one of Robin's jokes.
Say you can't joke about it because it's not funny.
Cord? This isn't the best place to make jokes about Mr. Cord.
Don't seem fair to me, don't seem right, but you can joke about it.
They have their joke, and you have yours.
Quit fooling' around and tell us what happened.
"Do you remember jokes and take pleasure in relating them to others?"
What are you doing? My eyesight is going, so I like a prank I can hear.
Hey, I'm sorry for all those tricks I've ever played on you, and I promise, hey, I promise I'll never play any more tricks.
Yes, and you start to say we are rubbish or those jokes you do.
You don't help yourself by treating this as a joke.
Now, listen, if this is another one of your gags, it isn't funny.
The way you seem to be all keyed up, a bit of my foolishness may do you no harm.
Your jokes with your friends, not with me.
Those jokes are exactly what I need after cooking for all the other pigs.
